1:
--------------------
Text: To the Metal!:  is the tenth full-length studio album by Gamma Ray.
Triplets:<Gamma Ray
2:
--------------------
Text: To the Metal!:  It was released on 29 January 2010.
Triplets:<To the Metal!
3:
--------------------
<Text: To the Metal!:  To promote the album, the band did a tour with Freedom Call and Secret Sphere.>
Triplets:<To the Metal!
4:
--------------------
Text: To the Metal!:  The album was recorded in Kai's own studio in Hamburg in autumn 2009.
Triplets:<To the Metal!
5:
--------------------
Text: To the Metal!:  The band has recorded 12 songs.
Triplets:<To the Metal!
7:
--------------------
Text: To the Metal!:  The band described some of the songs on the official website, revealing that there would be a full-throttle number called "Rise", a rhythmic and melodically diverse song called "Time To Live", and a multilayered anthem titled "All you need to know", featuring ex-Helloween frontman Michael Kiske.

Triplets:<To the Metal!
9:
--------------------
Text: To the Metal!:  It is the last album featuring drummer Dan Zimmermann.
Triplets:<To the Metal!
